profile: Software Engineer at MediaMarktSaturn working on a large-scale, multi-country Marketplace platform.
Experience building and operating full-stack, cloud-native applications supporting millions of products and thousands of third-party sellers.

blocks.title: Software Engineer
activities: Develop and maintain full-stack services for the MediaMarktSaturn Marketplace Order Management platform, operating across multiple European countries.
Contribute to systems supporting a marketplace with over 1.6 million products and 1,600+ third-party sellers, enabling scalable seller onboarding and order processing.
Build backend services using NestJS and TypeScript, focusing on reliability, clean APIs, and maintainable domain logic.
Develop frontend components using React to improve internal tools and seller-facing workflows.
Automate cloud infrastructure and deployments using Terraform, GitOps, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, QA, platform) to improve seller experience and ensure stable marketplace operations.

blocks.title: Software Engineer
activities: Contributed to the development and launch of a centralized publishing platform powering multiple high-traffic news websites within the VRM Group.
Implemented full-stack features using Node.js, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Vue.js, supporting content creation and delivery at scale.
Worked on APIs and frontend components used daily by editorial teams across several regional news outlets.
Collaborated closely with product owners and editors to deliver reliable publishing workflows.

blocks.title: Software Developer Intern
blocks.description: Development of web and mobile applications using modern JavaScript technologies:
activities: Developed features using React, React Native, Vue.js, ES6, and vanilla JavaScript.
Worked with Storybook, Strapi headless CMS, Webpack, Docker, GitLab CI, and Test-Driven Development (TDD).
Contributed to multiple client projects, gaining experience with production systems, deployment pipelines, and team-based development.

blocks.title: Software Testing Intern
activities: Set up JavaScript unit testing environments using Karma, Jasmine, and Node.js.
Implemented automated tests to improve code quality and regression safety.
Created and maintained Jenkins CI pipelines for build and test automation.
Developed build scripts using ANT and MS-DOS for legacy systems.

educationBlocks.summary: Master of Computer Science (Software Engineering specialization) | Grade: 1.7
educationBlocks.description: Topics included Software Engineering, Software Quality Assurance, High Performance Computing, Software Testing, and Model Checking.
